body: Well, I guess I haven't done one of these in a while and I'm quite curious the questions you guys would like to ask. So, go on ahead. Anything you can think of. (Stay appropriate) xD
body_tagged: Well, I guess I haven't done one of these in a while and I'm quite curious the questions you guys would like to ask. So, go on ahead. Anything you can think of. (Stay appropriate) xD
title: Due to recent promotion, (AMA!)

replies.body:
@Midnight: (And this can answer to MilkCream as well)
The 41901 is in my name from when my little brother was 6 years old and created a Game Center account for a game called Zombie Farm, and the ending numbers in the name were 41901. When creating my account for Minecraft, I figured I'd make it simple. Therefore, Jake41901 was born.

@MilkCream:
Well, you are um... A human I'm guessing?
That's a very good question... O.O
My true love at the moment is unspecified, (it's complicated)
RQT has many different meanings, but one I'm assuming is most rarely used is Relative Quantum Topological, which is often used in Quantum Physics.

@TheHoopsman:
3.1415926535897932384
Gotta be White Chip Macadamia nut.
Fury
Blue
That's pretty original, but death isn't on my to do list today
My skin is a guy. ... I guess that's all I can really say 
Refer to the first response of this reply
Definitely the feeling of helping players, and teaching how to be well rounded individuals. Being staff for me isn't only in game stuff, I've helped with many real life situations as well. 
iPhone FTW
